thread.title: Cellular Sales to Open New Store in Affton
thread.title_full: Cellular Sales to Open New Store in Affton

author: Chris Martin
title: Cellular Sales to Open New Store in Affton
text:
Rapidly growing to meet its customer demand for exceptional customer service, Cellular Sales, the nation’s largest Verizon premium retailer , will be adding to its 550 U.S. locations with its newest store in Affton. The new store, scheduled to open on Nov. 2, is located by the new Starbucks in front of Grasso Plaza at 9998 Gravois Road. This will be the second of five total locations Cellular Sales plans on opening in the St. Louis area.
“The community in Affton is vibrant and welcoming,” said Cherie Haynes, regional recruiter for Cellular Sales. “The Cellular Sales team is thrilled to become a part of it and provide Affton with our customer service and mobile technology assistance.”
For seven of the past eight years, Inc. Magazine has listed Cellular Sales as part of its annual Inc. 5000 list, naming it as one of the nation’s fastest-growing privately owned retailers. Since it was founded in 1993, the company has grown from a single store in Knoxville, Tenn., to the largest independent retailer of Verizon Wireless products, operating in 27 states.
The new Cellular Sales location is looking to hire 10 new employees to join its staff. Those who are interested in applying for jobs at the Affton Cellular Sales store may contact Haynes at (816) 866-2970.
“We’re looking for applicants who are interested in working on a dynamic team and providing meaningful solutions to our customers’ needs,” said Haynes. “If you’re interested in working in a fast-paced environment filled with meaningful customer interactions, this is the job for you!”
About Cellular Sales
Headquartered in Knoxville, Tenn., Cellular Sales was founded in 1993 and has been named by Inc. Magazine as one of the nation’s fastest-growing privately owned retailers for seven of the past eight years. In 2015, the privately owned retailer made the “Honor Roll,” a notable distinction for companies that have been recognized on the Inc. 5000 list for at least five consecutive years. The company currently employs nearly 4,600 people and operates approximately 550 stores nationwide. Job seekers may visit joincellularsales.com . For more information on the company, visit cellularsales.com .
